snippet: Isaias Alicea, who was given six months in prison, said he saw two men involved in a drug deal in the lobby of a New York City housing project, but video indicated otherwise.
abstract: Isaias Alicea, former New York City police officer charged with falsely claiming that he witnessed drug sale and for arresting innocent man, is sentenced to six months in prison.
lead_paragraph: Isaias Alicea, who was given six months in prison, said he saw two men involved in a drug deal in the lobby of a New York City housing project, but video indicated otherwise.

headline.main: Ex-Officer Sentenced for Lying About a Drug Sale
headline.print_headline: Sentencing For Ex-Officer Caught in Lie On Drug Sale
